segments.text: I watch as the boy stretches to reach into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s something endearing about his determination, even if it’s misguided.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I also feel a knot in my stomach watching him balance on that precarious stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s so close to falling; I can’t believe no one has stopped him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there’s the girl, her excited expression just waiting for the outcome.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It reminds me of my own childhood, those secretive moments of joy and risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But as much as I want to smile at their innocent play, I can’t help but feel tense about their safety.
segments.speaker: PAR
